section:
Extensive quays enclosed by a broad sea wall comprise the dockland area of Chambara. Here you can set sail if you have a ship, or buy one if you do not. If you have neither a ship of your own nor the money to buy one, it is also possible to hire passage on a vessel bound for other ports.
If your ship is docked here Buy a ship Hire crew for your ship Sell a ship Hire passage to another port Go back into the city
